title: It has been 10 years and Riot still hasn't flipped the Red Team's Camera
body:
This has been requested since League of Legends was in Beta because lots of people don't like spells coming in from their HUD. It's been so long that it used to be called the purple team. They can rotate the camera for their skin teasers and now this director program, so why can't we have that for playing the game?
Thanks, Riot.
